tests.title: Test Case1 - sets the headertext to the items name when doubled clicked
tests.fullTitle: Basic Page Elements Interaction Test Case1 - sets the headertext to the items name when doubled clicked

tests.title: Test Case2 - displays the correct count for the selected checkboxes
tests.fullTitle: Basic Page Elements Interaction Test Case2 - displays the correct count for the selected checkboxes

tests.title: Test Case3 - Dropdown list  - this should display name of currently selected item
tests.fullTitle: Basic Page Elements Interaction Test Case3 - Dropdown list  - this should display name of currently selected item

tests.title: Test Case4 - Mouse Hover functionality verification
tests.fullTitle: Basic Page Elements Interaction Test Case4 - Mouse Hover functionality verification
tests.code:
// debug statement which can be used in Browser Inspect Mode -> Sources tab
cy.get('[data-cy=box-4-items-list] > :nth-child(3)').trigger('mouseover').debug(); // assertion for checking EXISTENCE of element
cy.get('[data-cy=box-4-selected-name]').should('exist'); // assertion for chekcing VISIBILITY of element 
cy.get('[data-cy=box-4-selected-name]').should('be.visible'); // how to use AND for multiple assertions 
cy.get('[data-cy=box-4-selected-name]').invoke('text').should('equal', 'Option Three').and('contains', 'Option'); // Partial Text - Contains assertion 
cy.get('[class="sc-htoDjs jiqlbg"]').contains('Option Three'); // taking Percy snapshot 
cy.percySnapshot('Test Case1');

tests.title: should pass the audits
tests.fullTitle: Basic Page Elements Interaction should pass the audits

tests.title: should run performance audits using custom thresholds
tests.fullTitle: Basic Page Elements Interaction should run performance audits using custom thresholds
